channel.title: Red Carpet on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Noah Wyle Wears Tuxedo Made by Scrubs Brand to Emmys
item.description: The best drama actor winner for ‘The Pitt’ sported a custom navy suit created by health care apparel company FIGS.

item.title: Noah Wyle Wears Tuxedo Made by Scrubs Brand to Emmys
item.description: The best drama actor winner for ‘The Pitt’ sported a custom navy suit created by health care apparel company FIGS.

item.title: Star-Studded Kering Foundation Dinner Raises More Than $4.5M to Combat Violence Against Women
item.description: Salma Hayek Pinault, Jessica Chastain, Demi Moore, Dakota Johnson and Colman Domingo mixed with Jeff Koons, Anna Wintour and other A-listers to raise awareness and funds for women-focused NGOs.

item.title: Star-Studded Kering Foundation Dinner Raises More Than $4.5M to Combat Violence Against Women
item.description: Salma Hayek Pinault, Jessica Chastain, Demi Moore, Dakota Johnson and Colman Domingo mixed with Jeff Koons, Anna Wintour and other A-listers to raise awareness and funds for women-focused NGOs.

item.title: ‘Spinal Tap’ Members Recall Reaction When Pitching Original Film: “You’ve Never Seen More Bewildered Faces in Your Life”
item.description: Harry Shearer, Michael McKean and Christopher Guest are once again rocking on in Rob Reiner’s sequel ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues.’

item.title: ‘Spinal Tap’ Members Recall Reaction When Pitching Original Film: “You’ve Never Seen More Bewildered Faces in Your Life”
item.description: Harry Shearer, Michael McKean and Christopher Guest are once again rocking on in Rob Reiner’s sequel ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues.’

item.title: Fran Drescher Is “Ready to Do Other Things” After Four Years as SAG President, Says Union “Is in Fantastic Shape, Far Better Than When I Showed Up”
item.description: The ‘Nanny’ star explained why she’s not running for SAG-AFTRA president again this year while walking the carpet for ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues.’

item.title: Fran Drescher Is “Ready to Do Other Things” After Four Years as SAG President, Says Union “Is in Fantastic Shape, Far Better Than When I Showed Up”
item.description: The ‘Nanny’ star explained why she’s not running for SAG-AFTRA president again this year while walking the carpet for ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues.’

item.title: MTV VMAs: Sabrina Carpenter, Ariana Grande and More Stars on the Red Carpet
item.description: Stars were out in full force at the MTV Video Music Awards ceremony, which was held at UBS Arena on Sept. 7 in Long Island, New York.

item.title: Dylan O’Brien Says It “Sucked” When Sex Scenes From ‘Twinless’ Were Leaked Online: “Stop Doing That, It Affects Us”
item.description: Clips from the dark comedy, starring O’Brien and James Sweeney, circulated on social media after the film’s Sundance premiere.

item.title: Dylan O’Brien Says It “Sucked” When Sex Scenes From ‘Twinless’ Were Leaked Online: “Stop Doing That, It Affects Us”
item.description: Clips from the dark comedy, starring O’Brien and James Sweeney, circulated on social media after the film’s Sundance premiere.

item.title: Aubrey Plaza and Margaret Qualley on How They Shaped ‘Honey Don’t!’ Characters
item.description: The actors detail their collaborations with writer-director Ethan Coen and co-writer Tricia Cooke on the married pair’s neo-noir dark comedy detective movie.

item.title: Aubrey Plaza and Margaret Qualley on How They Shaped ‘Honey Don’t!’ Characters
item.description: The actors detail their collaborations with writer-director Ethan Coen and co-writer Tricia Cooke on the married pair’s neo-noir dark comedy detective movie.

item.title: Charlie Day “Would Be Up for” Third ‘Horrible Bosses’ Film, Has Had “Conversations About It”
item.description: The ‘It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia’ actor is aligned with Jennifer Aniston, who recently expressed her desire to return to the R-rated franchise.

item.description: The ‘It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia’ actor is aligned with Jennifer Aniston, who recently expressed her desire to return to the R-rated franchise.

item.title: Liam Neeson and Pamela Anderson Gush About Their Team-Up in ‘The Naked Gun’: “So Much Fun”
item.description: The two star in a continuation of the comedy franchise, which premiered in NYC on Monday.

item.title: Lindsay Lohan Wants to Do “Some More Serious, Dramatic Roles” After ‘Freakier Friday’
item.description: The star reunites with Jamie Lee Curtis for the ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel, then is looking to “really show people a different side of me.”
